snippet.title: Tales - early preview
snippet.description:
An early preview of Tales, a forthcoming point & click adventure by Ape Marina and published by Screen 7. Showcasing scenes and puzzles from the game. Suitable for all to play, help Alfred undo a curse he unwittingly unleashes in an ancient library...

Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=494079360

The game will feature English voice acting and various language subtitles will be available. Keep an eye out for a full trailer and the game itself coming soon!

Tales features original music by Luigi Di Guida. The music in this trailer "Honor" is licensed through premiumbeat.com. Please note this preview video is lower quality and not HD.
